Instance.description: This interaction will attempt to get the Sim to put down a carried object. Each interaction is one individual attempt. Subsequent attempts can be pushed as a result of failure, but that is handled by the PutDownLiability which should be added to each PutDownInteraction.

TunableVariant.name: object_to_put_down
TunableVariant.description: Define which object the Sim is to put down.

TunableTuple.name: from_hand
TunableTuple.description: Put down the object held in one of the Sim's hands.
